title: 1532-A
statement: A. A+B (Trial Problem)time limit per test2 smemory limit per test512 MBinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are given two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$. Print $$$a+b$$$.InputThe first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \\le t \\le 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases in the input. Then $$$t$$$ test cases follow.Each test case is given as a line of two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ ($$$-1000 \\le a, b \\le 1000$$$).OutputPrint $$$t$$$ integers — the required numbers $$$a+b$$$.ExampleInput41 5314 15-99 99123 987Output6 329 0 1110

processed.result:
You are given $t$ pairs of integers. For each pair $(a, b)$, print the sum $a + b$.

Constraints:

* $1 \le t \le 10^4$
* $-1000 \le a, b \le 1000$
You are given a number of pairs of numbers. For each pair, add the two numbers together and print the result.
